data.message: How do I take my mother off facebook she is not ever going to use it again and someone else has started using her account

replies.message: Hey Judy. If your mother can't get into her account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell her to go to the Hacked Accounts section at http://bit.ly/1VEU7W6 to get immediate help. You can also encourage her to visit Privacy Basics at http://bit.ly/1VEU7W4 for tips and guides to help her keep her account secure. -Abby
My husbands account has been hacked and now he cant even log in.    I have sent several reports and just now sent a private message.
Hey Mary. Please check your inbox. We responded to your message. -Jordan
Facebook I did but there are bigger problems than we can fix.  I responded again.
will Jordan I never got your inbox
Jordan well  u need to in box me

@Facebook help center 
Was wondering did you all have a promotion and drew names of people that. Wins money$1000. and have a Lady that works for you guys 
By the name of Debbie J 
She said i had Won and i friend,ed her. So she can get some info from me. Im kinda Freaking out wondering is this all true. ?? Can. Someone. Please help me out and let me know I.m kinda scared i haven,t never had nothing like this happen to me ???
